titleStmt.title: Despatch from J. Milton Turner to John L. Cadwalader, December 6, 1876

bibl.title: Despatch from J. Milton Turner to John L. Cadwalader
Despatches from United States Consuls in Monrovia, 1852-1906

div1.p:
Consulate General of the United States
Republic of Liberia

J Milton Turner
to the
Department of State
Washington U.S.A.
Transmitting corrected report for the quarter ended June 30th 1876

No. 1. Statement of Account
" 2. Abstract of contingent expenses
" 3. Voucher for postage
" 4. Vouchers for office furniture purchased June 11, 1876
" 5. Relating to the arrest of Frank Campbell viz: Voucher & Sherriff's certificate

New Richmond State of Ohio
December 6th 1876

I have the honor to transmit herewith, as directed by instruction under date the 16. October, my report for the quarter ended June the 30th 1876, with the necessary corrections made therein. I desire to renew my expressions of regret for the unpresentable state in which that report was at first forwarded to the Department; and to express the hope that the changed condition thereof will be satisfactory to the wishes of the Department

I have the honor to be
Sir:
With high consideration and esteem,
Your obedient servant
J Milton Turner
div1.fw:
Honorable
John L Cadwalader
Assistant Secretary of State
Washington
